scripts.lintall: echo '=> linting all the JS' && jshint js/*.js
scripts.mincss: echo '=> minify personal.css' && cleancss css/main.css -o css/main.min.css
scripts.minjs: echo '=> minify personal.js' && uglifyjs js/main.js -o js/main.min.js
scripts.build: echo '=> Minify All the things' && npm run mincss -s && npm run minjs -s
